mapper.sql: info.id, info.company_id, info.company_name, info.role_id, info.province_code, info.address, info.legal_name, info.legal_phone, info.legal_id_card, info.business_code, info.organization_code, info.tax_code, info.is_check, info.create_time, info.phone, info.business_photo_url, info.work_photo_url, info.deposit_money, info.lbs, info.is_delete, info.city_code, info.area_code, info.telephone, info.content, info.audit_status, info.lefal_card_up_url, info.lefal_card_down_url, info.work_card_from, info.work_card_indate, info.update_time, info.work_code, info.company_classify, info.site_company_id, info.business_type, info.platform_type, info.work_card_valid_start_date, info.work_card_valid_end_date, info.dealer_company_id
mapper.select: select company_info.id, company_info.company_id, company_info.company_name, company_info.phone from company_info company_info join pre_project_company_set pre_project_company_set on company_info.company_id = pre_project_company_set.company_id where pre_project_company_set.project_no = #{projectNo};

select , province.province_name, city.city_name, area.area_name,info.role_id from company_info info left join province province on info.province_code = province.province_code left join city city on info.city_code = city.city_code left join area area on info.area_code = area.area_code where info.is_delete = 2 and info.platform_type = 0 and info.company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.update: update company_info set audit_status = #{auditStatus} where company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.select: select audit_status auditStatus ,company_name as companyName ,t.company_id as companyId,legal_name as legalName,register_address as registerAddress, concat(pr.province_name,'>',ci.city_name,'>',ar.area_name,'>',f.register_address) as companyLocation, legal_id_card as legalIdCard,postcode,email,lefal_card_up_url as lefalCardUpUrl,lefal_card_down_url as lefalCardDownUrl, (CASE WHEN company_type = '0' THEN '有限责任公司' WHEN company_type = '1' THEN '股份有限公司' WHEN company_type = '2' THEN '股份有限公司' WHEN company_type = '3' THEN '股份有限公司' WHEN company_type = '4' THEN '股份有限公司' WHEN company_type = '5' THEN '股份有限公司' ELSE '其他' END ) as companyType, (CASE WHEN comapny_nature = '0' THEN '自营' WHEN comapny_nature = '1' THEN '合作' ELSE '其他' END ) as comapnyNature, (CASE WHEN is_three_to_one = '0' THEN '是' WHEN is_three_to_one = '1' THEN '否' ELSE '其他' END ) as isThreeToOne, business_code as businessCode,legal_phone as legalPhone ,organization_code AS organizationCode, (CASE WHEN is_taxpayer = '0' THEN '是' WHEN is_taxpayer = '1' THEN '否' ELSE '其他' END ) as isTaxpayer, tax_code_photo_url AS taxCodePhotoUrl ,business_photo_url AS businessPhotoUrl, work_card_from AS workCardFrom,work_card_indate AS workCardIndate, work_photo_url AS workPhotoUrl, work_code AS workCode from company_info t left join company_info_expand f on t.company_id = f.company_id left join province pr on f.register_province_code = pr.province_code left join city ci on f.register_city_code = ci.city_code left join area ar on f.register_area_code = ar.area_code where t.company_id = #{companyId}
